channel.title: First sig, ever
channel.description: Yeah Im not sure about the "3" icon anymore but I accidently flattened the image. Anyway rate it please. [img]http://img162.imageshack.us/img162/4963/sigha1.png[/img]

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @ReZZy ReZZy`
item.description:
@ReZZy wrote:

All of them are not very good. Try taking some tuts, it seems you haven’t taking a lot. Take PRO tuts, not beginner tuts. There you can learn stuff at a higher level and advance with it.

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

Slow reply yeah, a month? I’ve been learning abit more graphics. Looking back I now notice how badly cut out the render is. Ill have a remake of that tomorrow, or later on depending how tired I am.

EDIT:
I finished Attempt 3 V2 and here it is.

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“YupolaScape, post:30, topic:179910”]Attempt 3:

And nator, I do want actual constructive critism, something I can work on. I did my best who cares. I just wanted to know how I could get better ect.[/quote]

I actually really like that one. It’s quite good. The background really brings some questions to mind, for instance, how’d you do it? That’s a very nice background, even for some of the veteran members we have in the graphics section. I mean, I can see what you’ve done in order to get the background the way it is, but it has a sort of flow in it. Maybe because of the swirls, I don’t know. But it really pricks at my attention.

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

exe626:

Tutorials require previous knowledge, right now he needs to just keep experimenting. He needs to know what the tools do before reading a tutorial telling him to use it.

durrr…
I already said that in my other post. <_<

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

What i was recomending was beginer tuts. alot of them explain everything so he will not need prior knowlege. Secondly the knowlege he will gain from these tuts will be the best way for him to improve in the future.

There are also other tuts that explain the basics (not sig tuts but program tuts) these would be good for him also

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Omfg, finally.
This actually has some effort.
Let’s see what I can get from this…
Aight, the render needs work, you can still see the white cuts. Give it some effects, and blur out the white cuts.
Text is horrible. Don’t make it that big, just make a bit small and give it some effects.
The background, at a glance, blends in color with the render, but it has nothing to do with the render. The background is just, weird. I don’t know how the hell you did it, but I don’t really like it.
And I hate the size.

Let’s see…
3/10

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

Attempt 3:

And nator, I do want actual constructive critism, something I can work on. I did my best who cares. I just wanted to know how I could get better ect.

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:28, topic:179910”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=241139.msg2052387#msg2052387 date=1202976496]
Want a crit? I’ll give you a god damn crit…
The background does not have to do anything with the render, and it doesn’t blend.
There is no depth or lighting, and the logo doesn’t match either.
It has a bad render, and has no effects, it’s just pasted there.
For the background, I bet you just used an option from Photoshop’s (or w/e graphics program your using) interface graphic options.
fk.
-1/10
[/quote]gtfo my internets[/quote]
too bad.

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Austin5042, post:25, topic:179910”]lol, i think its good for a first time! dont listen to the assholes that just wanna make themselves look good… I give it a 5/10 for a first time.

keep working at it. i would suggest making everything blend. it’ll make things look better. and when you put jake on there, it kinda stands out, try to make that blend in with the background.

Also i like halo 3. im somewhat good at it… highest skill is 33, in slayer and doubles… my xbox360 is gettin repaired btw, so ive been devoting all my time to moparscape.

keep up the work![/quote]

You need to die. Nator even critiqued it better than you did.

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

lol, i think its good for a first time! dont listen to the assholes that just wanna make themselves look good… I give it a 5/10 for a first time.

keep working at it. i would suggest making everything blend. it’ll make things look better. and when you put jake on there, it kinda stands out, try to make that blend in with the background.

Also i like halo 3. im somewhat good at it… highest skill is 33, in slayer and doubles… my xbox360 is gettin repaired btw, so ive been devoting all my time to moparscape.

keep up the work!

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:22, topic:179910”][quote author=eVokki` link=topic=241139.msg2046764#msg2046764 date=1202746398]
You constantly come on the forums just to act as if you are above everyone and better than everyone at everything
[/quote]
Where did you get that from?[/quote]

Maybe from the fact that in 90% of topics that you post on, you either insult someone, tell them their work is shit when yours is not much better, maybe it’s even worse.

Read full topic

item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

El Oh El, again with the flaming.
There are some stuff you have to do on your own, the world didn’t start from humans getting help with dinosaurs, did it? His effort was minimum, he didn’t build it up, and he has to learn that himself. Of course you cannot force someone to add effort, so put effort into everything you do, because if you don’t, it will become into a habit. Graphics is helpable, but not if he learns to get some effort, because my first was better because I put in effort, and not any tuts. I pretty much helped him with everything. Since he’s new to graphics, the phrases “lighting” or “depth” might not be of recognition to him. So, just lead him to a starting point as of now.

Ey, try going here for your starting point, and maybe ask for help there, too.

That enough?

EDIT:

eVokki`:

You constantly come on the forums just to act as if you are above everyone and better than everyone at everything

Where did you get that from?

Read full topic

first of all…when you got a render thats has a reflecting part, always blur that out. will look bad to the viewer, unless the render had a battle field behind him.

item.description:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:14, topic:179910”]but technically that is all you do in the first place. use a few brushes a few images some text and a few filters…[/quote]So does all the ‘pros’. item.title: First sig, ever
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I doubt it’s your first, probably your second or third. I give it a 1/10. It’s pretty bad, all you did was copy a couple pictures and wrote Jake in a text box. After using a Filter on the background.

but technically that is all you do in the first place. use a few brushes a few images some text and a few filters…

Read full topic
